JSE.JO.summary: JSE Limited operates as a securities exchange in South Africa. It offers capital markets, post-trade, and information services. The company also provides trading services for equities and indices; debt, including corporate, green, and government bonds; and derivative markets, such as equity, bond, interest rate, commodity, and currency derivatives; and repo market, as well as offers equity market data. In addition, its clearing and settlement operations include cash equities, cash bonds, interest rate valuations, clearing and settlement operational projects, swift equities clearing system(ECS), and settlement authority lending system (SALS); and post-trade risk management and other services. The company was founded in 1887 and is based in Sandton, South Africa.
